entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_49982/test49982/test49982.sh #91096
  • Got ExecutionEngineException - although it is marked as obsolete and not supposed to be thrown #91087
  • `Http2_MultipleConnectionsEnabled` test failures #91075
    8.0.0
  • Options generator perf improvements #91073
    9.0.0
  • Add AOT-compatible XUnit runner #91069
    8.0.0
  • Codepage GB18030 does not implement the latest version of the standard GB18030-2022 #91068
    Future
  • .NET SDK on Ubuntu 18.04.6 libnethost.a contains inexisting libstdc++ symbol #91067
  • [mono] AOT error: Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/method-to-ir.c:6456, condition `!sig->has_type_parameters' not met #91066
    8.0.0
  • native aot regression in .net 8.0 #91065
  • EncryptedXml fails to decrypt element encrypted by a X509 certificate referenced by a negative issuer serial #91064
    9.0.0
  • CodeDom - method invocation on a string with length in a range of 80 to 256 chars or above 1500 chars #91060
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond. #91052
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.1.23415.7] videoduplicatefinder fail to import Scan Result with System.InvalidOperationException #91048
  • Specific Win10/11 Proxysettings cause wrong result in WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy.GetProxy(...) #91045
  • Creating symbolic links is broken when paths are virtualized #91044
    Future
  • Microsoft.NET.HostModel.Tests failing with "No space left on device" #91039

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Sytem.Net.NameResolution lib support lookup diversiform DNS types #91051
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Vectorization/UnrollEqualsStartsWIth/UnrollEqualsStartsWIth.dll #86265
    8.0.0
  • Read files generated by obsolete BinaryFormatter #88316
    Future
  • Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets: stop using legacy runtime graph #90977
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' #91062
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Rationalize IR' #91056
    8.0.0
  • Question: `System.Diagnostics.ActivitySamplingResult` usage #91070
  • System.Memory.Tests.Span.StringSearchValuesTests failing with "Exit code was 1 but it should have been 42" #90945
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 76 Regressions from tracking VectorT as "optimistic" for crossgen2 #87486
    8.0.0
  • Prevent CS0121 (ambiguous method calls) resulting from config binding source gen #86363
    8.0.0
  • Add test for successfully matching current RID when reading an empty RID graph #86250
    9.0.0
  • Create custom InlineArray marshaller for `LibraryImport` generator #86572
    8.0.0
  • Error in DefaultHttpClientFactory timer method #91053
    8.0.0
  • MonoInterpreter doesn't correctly handle overshifting of a vector #89938
    8.0.0
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SyncForceNonBlocking.SendRecv_Stream_TCP' #89784
    9.0.0
  • AggressiveOptimization is reported as Tier1 #90490
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 6] System.IO.Compression.Native has incorrect file version #91055
  • [API Proposal]: Simplify IEnumerable implementation #91043
  • cross build win-x64 on macOS: app.manifest requireAdministrator not working #91047
  • Upgrade the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* version to use compiler interceptors for source gen #90849
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] perf pipeline broken - `Unable to determine the .NET SDK used for net8.0` on `main` #91011
    9.0.0
  • Assembly.Location returns `/` instead of the actual path intermittently #90657
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch HostVersionCompatibility test to use 6.0 as old runtime #91098
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Fix stack_limit handling #91095
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Recommend [In] and [Out] attributes on array parameters #91094
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use xunit.assert fork in dotnet/runtime #91091
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Use RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath if available in runtime copy of Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets #91090
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Skip Create(ToScalar(Dot(...))) transformation on mismatched types #91089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix physical promotion creating overlapping local uses #91088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Strip singlefilehost before publishing if it was built with symbols #91086
    area-Setup
  • JIT: add ability to pad profile counters and adjust scalable count th… #91081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • New Microsoft.BCL.Numerics package #91074
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91072
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91071
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91061
    Servicing-consider, blocked, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #91059
    Servicing-consider, blocked, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #91046
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix JIT_ByRefWriteBarrier unwinding on macOS x64 #91076
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Suppress credscan warnings in X.509 test files #91080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2251942 #91082
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Don't allocate jiterpreter AOT tables unless AOT was enabled at build time #90978
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/8.0] `PEImage` should not permit `m_path` field mutation #91085
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath if available in runtime copy of Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets #91077
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix stack_limit handling #90937
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #90904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Skip Create(ToScalar(Dot(...))) transformation on mismatched types #91063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix physical promotion creating overlapping local uses #91058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve enum documentation #88191
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding missing System.Buffers documentation #90891
    needs-area-label
  • `PEImage` should not permit `m_path` field mutation #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable RemoteExecutor SearchValues tests on LinuxBionic #90954
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Suppress credscan warnings in X.509 test files #91041
    area-System.Security
  • Add test for using fallback RID when reading an empty RID graph #91040
    area-Host
  • [main] Forward port metrics tests #91026
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [release/8.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #91023
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.22
  • [release/7.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #91015
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads, 7.0.11
  • [release/6.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #90994
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Improve ActivitySamplingResult comments #91050
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Docs][tests] Add Mono Profiled AOT Functional Test and doc #90959
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #90875
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • SendRecv_Stream_TCP: also timeout send/receive, escape xunit sync context #90949
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Clean up AggressiveOpt tier in vm #90504
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove a quirk in fgMorphLeafLocal #90988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS version to 4.7.0 #91006
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline build with 9.0 sdk #91021
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete some dead code` #91018
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90968
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0

    area-System.Threading
  • [browser] download sequence optimization #90388

  • JIT: Remove TYP_BOOL #90981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
